"Now that your account has been approved, you'll need to fill out your profile! The first" "set of questions will capture some basic information. The remaining questions will ask" "about your living arrangement preferences. This is the data that we will use to match you" "to potential roommates, so please answer honestly. \n\n"
"For each of the questions below, please indicate your stance by selecting one of the" "options. Each question must be answered. (Make sure you scroll all the way down! You will" "be able to update this information at a later time."
"Would you like to live in a gender inclusive room? (This means that your roommate(s)" "could be of any gender.)"

"Please select the first-year house that you most want to live in. (Potential roommate" "matches will include those who select other houses, but this selection will be factored" "into the matching algorithm.)"

"Now on to the living arrangement information!\n\n"
"Remember, each question must be answered. You will be able to update this information at" "a later time."
"1. How much white noise do you prefer when sleeping?"
"2. How organized do you prefer shared spaces to be?"
"3. How often do you clean your living space?"

"Here you can answer some questions with open answers to" "display on your profile. This is a great way for people to get to know you better." "The questions that you do answer will only be viewable to people who you have matched" "with.\n\n"
"You can answer as many or as few questions as you'd like. To answer a question, simply" "type in the box underneath the question. Once you are done, click submit at the bottom."
"1. If you could erase one TV show from your memory and watch it afresh," "what show would it be?"
"ex: \"Parks and Recreation,\" to hear the jokes for the first time" "again."
"2. What is your least favorite genre of music?"
"3. If you were stranded on a deserted island with nothing but 1000 bricks," " what would you do?"
"4. What is your favorite way to waste time?"
"5. What popular thing do you hate?"
"6. Would you rather fight one horse-size duck or 100 duck-size horses?" "Why?"
"7. What is your favorite obscure history fact?"
